pageProduct.name: Thompsons Ashwagandha Complex Day 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Ashwagandha Complex Day traditionally used in Ayurvedic medicine to calm the mind and improve memory and cognition.

The Ashwagandha Complex Day is formulated with two herbal ingredients Ashwagandha and Bacopa. Ashwagandha is traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to help the body adapt to stress. Ashwagandha and Bacopa are traditionally used in Ayurvedic medicine to enhance brain health and to improve:
- cognitive performance.
- memory recall.
- learning ability.

Suitable For: Vegan/Vegetarian friendly

Size: 60 Tablets

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Enhance brain health
• Improve cognitive performance
• Improve memory recall
• Improve learning ability
• Ashwagandha is traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to help the body adapt to stress

Warnings

If symptoms persist, talk to a Ayurvedic practitioner/health professional if you are unsure if this medicine is right for you.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Active ingredients per tablet:
Bacopo moniera (Bacopa) ext. 150mg.
derived from dry leaf 3.0g (3000mg).
std. to contain bacosides 35mg.
Withania somnifera (Ashwagandha) ext. 150mg.
derived from dry root 1.5g (1500mg).
std. to contain withanolides 3.75mg.

Allergen Free From: Artificial Colours| Artificial Flavours| Dairy| Egg| Fish| Gluten| Lactose| Nuts| Sesame Seeds| Soy

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Remove cap and recycle glass.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
